input_email_body:
Subject: 

Hello Customer Support, I am inquiring about the integration capabilities for our SaaS solution with third-party tools. Could you provide detailed information on the available integrations, API documentation, webhooks, and pre-built connectors? I would greatly appreciate any guidance on setting up and configuring these integrations My name is Carlos Mendoza.. Additionally, could you let me know about any limitations or restrictions regarding the types of integrations we can make? I look forward to hearing back from you. Thank you in advance for your assistance. You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.
